headline: NTPC Green Energy share price gains over 3% on signing of 1000 MW power purchase deal
intro: NTPC Green Energy shares rose 3.8% to  ?112 after announcing a Power Purchase Agreement for 1,000 MW capacity. The company reported a net profit increase of 255% in Q1 and a 39% rise in FY25 profit, reflecting strong performance in the renewable energy sector.
imagecaption: NTPC Green Energy share price gains over 3% on signing of 1000 MW power purchase deal

headline: RRB NTPC Admit Card 2025: Railway Recruitment Board to release CBT 1 hall ticket today; how to download
intro: RRB NTPC Admit Card 2025: Railway Recruitment Board will release the RRB NTPC CBT 1 admit card today. The exam for various non-technical posts will take place from June 4 to June 24 for a total of 8,113 vacancies.
imagecaption: RRB NTPC Admit Card 2025: The RRB NTPC CBT 1 exam will take place from June 4 to June 24.

headline: NTPC's project execution delays remain its Achilles heel
intro: The company plans substantial capacity addition, but execution risks remain high, affecting overall market confidence.
imagecaption: NTPC missed its capacity addition target of 6 GW in FY25 due to land transfer and supply issues.

headline: NTPC vs NHPC: Which power PSU stock deserves a spot in your portfolio after Q4 results?
intro: Stocks to buy: NTPC and NHPC, state-owned power companies, reported steady Q4FY25 results. NTPC's net profit rose 22%, prompting brokerages to adjust target prices. NHPC's profit grew 52%, but ICICI Securities downgraded its rating, given the recent run-up in shares.
imagecaption: NTPC vs NHPC after Q4 numbers: Which power PSU deserves a spot in your portfolio?

headline: NTPC Q4 Results: Net profit rises 4% to  ?5,778 crore, revenue 3% YoY; Dividend declared
intro: NTPC Q4 Results: The board of directors has recommended a final dividend of 33.50 per cent ( ?3.35 per share) for 2024-25, subject to approval of shareholders in the ensuing annual general meeting.
